name: Revolutionary Army General Headquarters
text: Activate: Main You may trash 1 card from your hand and rest this Stage: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Revolutionary Army} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
